thread.title: Jeanne Rock-Wheeler
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Jeanne Rock-Wheeler

author: Jeanne Rock-Wheeler
title: Jeanne Rock-Wheeler
text: I ordered recently after a long respite. My motherhood duties took me away from puzzles and any time for myself for that matter. I looked at White Mountain again after years and they have grown into something beautiful! I ordered a fabulous puzzle and will assemble it after I complete the one I started while waiting from my new puzzle to arrive. (Yes and old one from White Mountain that I never opened from years ago!) I will order again and now my teenage kids and my dad with a mild dementia are all enjoying time together! Thank you for sticking around and for being so reliable!
